nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.local

Class LocalAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.engine.Adaptor
      • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.local.LocalAdaptor

  • public class LocalAdaptor
extends nl.esciencecenter.octopus.engine.Adaptor
    LocalAdaptor implements an Octopus adaptor for local operations.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Maassen
